name.en: Bat of the Twin Blaze Fiends
name.ja: <ruby>双<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>焔<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby>の<ruby>飛<rt>ひ</rt></ruby><ruby>鼠<rt>そ</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Set 1 "Altar of the Twin Blaze Fiends" and/or "Cage of the Blaze Fiends" from your Graveyard to your Spell & Trap Zone.
